issue.title: Writing Arrow Files using C#.
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17873](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17873). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Was working with Arrow along with C# and wanted to know a way to write to an arrow file using C#.

Do let me know if there's anything regarding this. Was not able to find anything on the internet.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17873?focusedCommentId=17611214) by David Sisson (dsisson):*
There is an Apache Arrow file writer class – does this accomplish your needs?

https://github.com/apache/arrow/blob/master/csharp/src/Apache.Arrow/Ipc/ArrowFileWriter.cs
